lines.text: Thank you Sheriff.
[turns to leave]
Any time.

[slaps her on the butt]
Any time at all.

[turns back to him]
If you weren't the Sheriff, I'd call one.
Your bottom's wet.
So's your chin.
I stole a Bible, Em. Do you want to read over Frank?
You know damn right well I can't read! The hell with him anyway!
You shouldn't have done that, Em. You're gonna get God mad at us and he's liable to...
Shut your damn mouth!
Well, I want to say something over Frank!
Well, say it and get it the hell over with!
All right... Frank... you're dead! God... damn if I don't miss you already, you miserable bastard!
You're a hard woman, Hannie Caulder.
Like the man said, there aren't any hard women, only soft men.

If you're too close to a man, you see too much of him. You can watch him sweat, wet his mouth, blink. And while you're eyes are taking all that in, he can kill you. Back off. See everything and nothing.

[teaching Hannie to deal with multiple adversaries]
Now, there's a feller over here on your left, lookin' mean. Standing tall in the sun. He's got his thumbs hooked in his gunbelt, legs wide apart, hat tipped back. Over on your right is a fellow who's face you can't see. His hat's over his eyes, he's turned away from you , looks like he doesn't even notice you. Now, you gotta kill both of 'em. It would behoove you to kill the fastest one first. Up to it.

[Hannie thinks for a moment, draws and shoots the target to the side]
Here.
[thumps his chest]
Right here. Let's keep working.
[last lines]

[voiceover]
Watch his hands. Watch his eyes. Remember you're a target too. Pick your spot. Ready, Hannie, get ready. Now!
[Hannie shoots]
Again, Hannie, again!
[Hannie fires her gun twice more]
Win or lose, you lose, Hannie Caulder.
Damn it woman, you didn't have to cut him in half. Did ya?
Both halves match don't they?
That bitch! Who the hell does she think she is, treating my family to a funeral!
Win or lose, you lose, Hannie Caulder.
Again, Hannie, Again.
Get up! Strap it on!
Can I put my pants on?
You're not gonna need them for long.
What the hell's this all about?
I'm gonna kill ya.
Hmmm, hmmm, ha, ha, ha
Just drop the damn bottle.
with her back turned to Rufus. Hello Rufus.
I heard you got real smart since we saw you last.
Funny, I didn't hear the same thing about you.
